original_solution_mapping.L1: It will take her 72 minutes in the washer + 50 minutes in the dryer = <<72+50=122>>122 minutes for the whites.
original_solution_mapping.L2: It will take her 58 minutes in the washer + 65 minutes in the dryer = <<58+65=123>>123 minutes for the darks.
original_solution_mapping.L3: It will take her 45 minutes in the washer + 54 minutes in the dryer = <<45+54=99>>99 minutes for the colors.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3684.
    Returns: the total time in minutes to wash and dry all three loads of laundry.
    """
    # L1
    whites_wash_time = 72 # 72 minutes in the washing machine
    whites_dry_time = 50 # 50 minutes in the dryer
    total_time_whites = whites_wash_time + whites_dry_time

    # L2
    darks_wash_time = 58 # 58 minutes in the washing machine
    darks_dry_time = 65 # 65 minutes in the dryer
    total_time_darks = darks_wash_time + darks_dry_time

    # L3
    colors_wash_time = 45 # 45 minutes in the washer
    colors_dry_time = 54 # 54 minutes in the dryer
    total_time_colors = colors_wash_time + colors_dry_time

    # L4
    total_laundry_time = total_time_whites + total_time_darks + total_time_colors

    # FA
    answer = total_laundry_time
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: It will take her {whites_wash_time} minutes in the washer + {whites_dry_time} minutes in the dryer = <<{whites_wash_time}+{whites_dry_time}={total_time_whites}>>{total_time_whites} minutes for the whites.
It will take her {darks_wash_time} minutes in the washer + {darks_dry_time} minutes in the dryer = <<{darks_wash_time}+{darks_dry_time}={total_time_darks}>>{total_time_darks} minutes for the darks.

It will take her {colors_wash_time} minutes in the washer + {colors_dry_time} minutes in the dryer = <<{colors_wash_time}+{colors_dry_time}={total_time_colors}>>{total_time_colors} minutes for the colors.

Altogether, it will take {total_time_whites} minutes for whites + {total_time_darks} minutes for darks + {total_time_colors} minutes for colors = <<{total_time_whites}+{total_time_darks}+{total_time_colors}={total_laundry_time}>>{total_laundry_time} minutes to do the laundry.
